author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/), D8H
description:
When the checkbox is checked, the condition `Checked` is verified.
A halo appears when the mouse hovers near the checkbox.

Checkbox cannot be toggled by users if any of these are true:
- Checkbox is hidden
- Checkbox's layer is hidden
- Checkbox is disabled

Checkbox can always be changed by an action.
name: Checkbox
shortDescription: Checkbox that can be toggled by a left-click or touch.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Checkbox can be toggled by a left-click or touch.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Checkbox

events.comment: Make sure object doesn't get re-drawn every frame
Use correct min value (instead of always starting at 0)
Set track height function (which enforces valid thumb sizes)
Start halo at same size as thumb
Track where the mouse is (in relation to object)
Move checkbox when being dragged
End sliding and update variables
Update "Value" based on the location of the thumb
Grow halo even more when pressed
Detect hover/touch/click (but only if the layer and object is visible, and the object is not already being dragged)
Detect mouse clicks near track, start dragging
Reset hover detection
Grow halo when hovered
Shrink halo to zero when not hovered
Redraw checkbox only when halo is not at final size
Set inactive track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw inactive track
Draw half circle at end of track (inactive side)
Set active track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw active track (2 pixels bigger than property)
Draw half circle at end of track (active side)
Prepare halo
Draw halo (it will grow or shrink as needed)
Use a more opaque halo while being dragged (it will grow or shrink as needed)
Prepare thumb settings
Draw Circle thumb
Draw Rectangle thumb

eventsFunctions.description: Check (or uncheck) the checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: SetChecked

eventsFunctions.description: Enable or disable the checkbox. Users cannot interact while it is disabled.
eventsFunctions.name: SetEnabled

events.comment: Stop dragging (so the checkbox won't be dragging when it gets enabled)
Reset halo size (so halo won't appear when checkbox gets enabled)

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the checkbox is being dragged.
eventsFunctions.name: IsBeingDragged

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the checkbox interations are enabled.
eventsFunctions.name: IsEnabled

eventsFunctions.description: The value of the checkbox (based on position of the thumb).
eventsFunctions.name: Value

eventsFunctions.description: Change the value of a checkbox (this will move the thumb to the correct position).
eventsFunctions.name: SetValue

events.comment: Set the proper offset (it moves the checkbox)

eventsFunctions.description: The maximum value of a checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: ValueMax

eventsFunctions.description: Change the minimum value of a checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: SetValueMax

eventsFunctions.description: The tick spacing of a checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: TickSpacing

eventsFunctions.description: Change the tick spacing of a checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: SetTickSpacing

eventsFunctions.description: Change length of track.
eventsFunctions.name: SetTrackLength

events.comment: Move thumb to correct place (based on new track size)

eventsFunctions.description: Change thickness of track.
eventsFunctions.name: SetTrackThickness

events.comment: Make sure thumb width is not smaller than track height + 2 pixels (to prevent track ends from showing)

eventsFunctions.description: Change width of thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbWidth

events.comment: Thumb cannot be less than track thickness (plus 2 pixels)

eventsFunctions.description: Change height of thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbHeight

events.comment: Thumb cannot be less than track thickness (plus 2 pixels)

eventsFunctions.description: Change radius of the halo around the thumb.  This size is also used to detect interaction with the checkbox.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHaloRadius

eventsFunctions.description: Change shape of thumb (circle or rectangle).
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbShape

events.comment: Make sure thumb width is not smaller than track height (to prevent track ends from showing)

eventsFunctions.description: Make track use rounded ends.
eventsFunctions.name: SetRoundedTrack

eventsFunctions.description: Change opacity of thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbOpacity

eventsFunctions.description: Change opacity of inactive track.
eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveTrackOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change inactive track opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change opacity of active track.
eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveTrackOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change active track opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of the track that is LEFT of the thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveTrackColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change active track color of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of the track that is RIGHT of the thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveTrackColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change inactive track color of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the thumb color to a specific value.
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbColor

eventsFunctions.description: Update the hitbox.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateHitbox

propertyDescriptors.label: Inactive track color (thumb color by default)
propertyDescriptors.name: InactiveTrackColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Active track color (thumb color by default)
propertyDescriptors.name: ActiveTrackColor
